verbs.description: [ARG0: The group Families Belong Together] [V: organized] [ARG1: marches] [ARGM-LOC: across the country] [ARGM-PRP: to protest the Trump administration ’s new “ zero tolerance ” immigration policy that separates immigrant children from their families] .

[ARG0: The group Families Belong Together] organized marches across the country to [V: protest] [ARG1: the Trump administration ’s new “ zero tolerance ” immigration policy that separates immigrant children from their families] .

The group Families Belong Together organized marches across the country to protest [ARG0: the Trump administration ’s new “ zero tolerance ” immigration policy] [R-ARG0: that] [V: separates] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their families] .
